name: Big Brave Business with Sarah & Amanda

episodes.title: 35: What do Religious Cults, Corporate Culture, and Online Marketing have in Common?
episodes.description:
Amanda has alluded to her religious trauma from her past on this podcast before, and in this episode we decided to dig in. On one hand, we can get to know her better. On another hand, you might relate to her story. And on a third hand, we can all relate: because these same practices and tactics show up in corporate life and in online marketing. 






This is the beginning of what turned into a three-part series, so make sure to follow the podcast so you get notified when next week’s episode drops, when we start to dig into Deconstruction. 






 Check out our YouTube Channel (new videos every Wednesday!):


Come meet our FRIENDS. Totally new content (not the same as the podcast episodes).
